Question
========

If you simultaneously flip four coins, what is the probability that all coins will have cross above?

Answerlist
----------

* $\frac{1}{2}$
* $\frac{1}{4}$
* $\frac{1}{8}$
* $\frac{1}{16}$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* $\frac{1}{2}$: Incorrect
* $\frac{1}{4}$: Incorrect
* $\frac{1}{8}$: Incorrect
* $\frac{1}{16}$: Correct
